scripts.deploy:init: BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current); git checkout --orphan deploy; git commit --allow-empty -m "initialize deploy branch"; git push -u origin deploy; git checkout $BRANCH
scripts.predeploy: rm -rf .vitepress/dist; git clone $(git remote get-url origin) -b deploy --depth 1 .vitepress/dist; npm run build;
scripts.deploy: MSG=$(git log --oneline | head -n 1); cd .vitepress/dist; git add -A; git commit -m "${MSG}"; git push
